name: Blazing Lazers [TG16]
description:
Blazing Lazers / Gunhed (ガンヘッド) is a Shoot 'Em Up video game published by Compile, Hudson Soft released on 1989 for the TurboGrafx-16.
Blazing Lazers (ブレイジングレーザーズ) is a Shooter video game published by Hudson Soft released on July 21st, 2010 for the PlayStation Portable.
